title: Silicon nanowire-incorporated efficient and flexible PEDOT:PSS/silicon hybrid solar cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00439F, Paper
Deepak Sharma, Ruchi K. Sharma, Avritti Srivastava, Vamsi K. Komarala, Arman Ahnood, Pathi Prathap, Sanjay K. Srivastava
Highly efficient Si nanowire (SiNW)-incorporated thin-flexible hybrid solar cells in a simple device design are developed on low-cost Si wafers, which may lead to the realization of cost-effective flexible Si hybrid solar cell technology.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
